name: Monk Island ~ The Everything RPG
description:
What if there was an RPG where every little action was a skill?Help the people of Monk Island to get rid of their crab infestation! The crabs seem neverending! Can you get rid of them for good?

Patch #1:

  • Talking to one monk no longer locks you out of dialogue with the others.
  • All 3D sounds re-added.
  • The monks' talking points now reset after 30 seconds; making dialogue skills no longer pointless.
